text: 17:23-24 Matyu 24:23-27; Mak 13:21; Luk 17:21; 21:8Gumazamiziba ia mɨkɨmam, ‘Ara muna!’ o ‘Ara kara!’ Ezɨ ia fo, Gumazamizibar Otarim izamin dughiam an onɨmarimɨn mɨn taghtagham. Eghtɨma an angazangarim bar overiamɨn ruaghatevimning uagharam aningɨn tagham. Eghtɨ ia ivemar men akaba gɨn mangan markɨ.
